title: Tech Roadmaps: Your Path to Mastery
tagline: Personalized learning roadmaps for every tech domain.
intro_paragraph: Learning something new can feel overwhelming when you don’t know where to start. That’s why we’ve built a platform that gives you a clear, structured roadmap for any field you choose — from web development and data science to UI design and cybersecurity. Each roadmap is carefully designed to guide you step by step, with curated resources, projects, and checkpoints to track your progress.
frontend_desc: Craft beautiful and interactive user interfaces for the web.
backend_desc: Build the server-side logic and APIs that power applications.
programming_desc: Master foundational concepts in languages like Python, Java, and C++.
cybersecurity_desc: Protect systems, networks, and data from digital threats.
database_desc: Design, manage, and query complex data systems.
datascience_desc: Analyze and visualize data to extract meaningful insights.
machinelearning_desc: Create intelligent systems that learn from data to make predictions.
about_text: Anas Elmarihi ,I am an IT student from Morocco with a strong passion fortechnology, design, and problem-solving. I enjoy learning new tools, building creative projects, andexploring how technology can make life easier and smarter. My main goal is to keep improving my skillsevery day and to share what I learn with others who want to grow in the tech world.
footer_copyright: © 2025 TechRoadmaps | By Anas Elmarihi All Rights Reserved.
agree_terms: I agree to the terms & conditions
frontend_intro: This roadmap outlines the path to becoming a frontend developer, from the foundational building blocks of the web to modern frameworks and tools.
frontend_p1_d1: Learn the structure of web pages.
frontend_p1_d2: Style your web pages with colors, fonts, and layouts.
frontend_p1_d3: Add interactivity and dynamic behavior to your sites.
frontend_p2_d1: Track changes in your code and collaborate with others.
frontend_p2_d2: Learn a modern framework like React, Vue, or Angular.
frontend_p2_d3: Manage your project's dependencies with npm or yarn.
frontend_p3_d1: Bundle and optimize your project's assets with Vite or Webpack.
frontend_p3_d2: Ensure your code quality with tools like Jest or Vitest.
frontend_p3_d3: Add static types to JavaScript to catch errors early.
